data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hervé, Christophe, Roberts, Michael J., Murphy, John A. (2009): A taxonomic revision of the genus Drassodex Murphy, 2007 (Araneae: Gnaphosidae). Zootaxa 2171: 1-28, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.189206
